text: @ChristinaKTLA @GavinNewsom The #coronavirus is from communist #China and therefore hates America.  As such, anti-American protests provide immunity because it makes the virus happy, while patriotic celebrations can cause it to spread because it makes the virus mad.  It's all very simple really.
